MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://www.asp-shareware.org/pad

Site.Site_DESCRIPTION: This PAD extension allows you to add your site info into your PAD file. This info can be used by site submission software or by web directories themselves.
Site.Site_Description_250: Easy and quick database administration, natively supports MSSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Postgre SQL, MS Access, EffiProz. Main features: Creating and restoring backups. Transfer data between databases, tables and data files or edit database schema.
Site.Site_Description_450: Easy and quick database administration, natively supports MSSQL, MySQL, SQLite, Postgre SQL, MS Access, EffiProz. Main features: Creating and restoring backups. Transfer data between databases, tables and data files (supported formats are XML, CSV, HTML, Excel). Edit database schema, tables, views and other db objects. Run queries, generating query templates. View, edit, filter and sort data in tables. SQL script manager. More features in Proffesional and Ultimate editions.
Site.Site_Keywords: database, manager, organizer, explorer, mysql, mssql, sqlite, effiproz, sqlserver, jet, access, postgre, tsql, sql, backup

Program_Info.Program_Change_Info: New wizard to created versioned database. Diagrams automatically binded to last version.
Program_Info.Program_Categories: Business & Finance :: Database Managers,Programming :: Databases & Networks,Programming :: SQL

Permissions.Distribution_Permissions: DatAdmin Database Versioning can be freely distributed over the internet in an unchaged form
Permissions.EULA:
END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT If you install or copy DatAdmin you agree with conditions of this agreement. If you don't agree with it, don't install nor copy DatAdmin.
DatAdmin Database Versioning is shareware, you can use it 30 days for free, than it is neccessary to buy or uninstall it.

The USER must assume the entire risk of using the SOFTWARE, and author of DatAdmin shall have no liability to the user of DatAdmin or any other third-party for any damages whatsoever, including, but not limited to, any economic or data loss, even if such loss was foreseeable by author of DatAdmin.

Press_Release.Press_Release: Prague, Czech Republic, August 12, 2009 JenaSoft today announced release 3.2 of new generation cross-platform database administration tool, DatAdmin. DatAdmin offers easy and quick to use database administration tools in intuitive enviroment. It can be used to browse and change database structure, run and generate SQL queries, edit table data, backup and restore database, export table and database structure into various formats, synchronize database structure, visually build queries, create database diagrams, maintain database model. DatAdmin supports MySQL, MS SQL, Postgre SQL, SQLite, EffiProz and MS Access databases. DatAdmin is primarily developed for Windows, but the newest version can run also under Linux using mono platform. New version adds support for Linux, new advanced exports (batch export of BLOB fields into more files, batch export of mutliple tables) and imports (import from text using regular expressions), command line interface, new wizards, support of events for MySQL 5.1 and easy connectivity to MySQL over PHP tunnel. DatAdmin is available in two editions: Personal, which is free, and Professional for $60 per installation. For more informations please visit DatAdmin homepage, http://datadmin.com JenaSoft is a Czech software company founded in 2006, specialized in database software.
Press_Release.Headline: DatAdmin 3.2.2, new database management tool, is released
Press_Release.Summary: JenaSoft today announced release 3.2 of new generation cross-platform database administration tool, DatAdmin. DatAdmin offers easy and quick to use database administration tools in intuitive enviroment

English.Keywords: database, manager, version, versioning, mysql, mssql, sqlite, sqlserver, tsql, sql
English.Char_Desc_80: Database versioning control. Generating difference scripts. Reverse engineering.
English.Char_Desc_250: Database versioning control. Generating difference scripts. Reverse engineering. Generating C# code handling DB upgrade. Handling of static data. Support for MS SQL, MySQL, Postgres, SQLite.
English.Char_Desc_450: Database versioning control. Generating difference scripts. Reverse engineering. Easy to use with wizards and drag & drop support. Generating C# code handling DB upgrade. Handling of static data. Support for MS SQL, MySQL, Postgres, SQLite. Database diagrams. Support for tables, constraints, vies, stored procedures, functions. Database models are stored in readable XML files.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Database versioning control. Generating difference scripts. Reverse engineering. Easy to use with wizards and drag & drop support. Generating C# code handling DB upgrade. Handling of static data. Support for MS SQL, MySQL, Postgres, SQLite. Database diagrams. Support for tables, constraints, vies, stored procedures, functions. Database models are stored in readable XML files.
